meanings.definition: Cause to be in a state of confusion or disarray.
meanings.sent1: The mischievous puppy was disordering the neatly arranged shoes.
meanings.sent2: The strong wind was disordering the papers on the desk.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved disordering the deck of cards in a surprising way.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected news completely disordering her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter disordering the solemn atmosphere of the library.

meanings.definition: Disturb the systematic arrangement or functioning of.
meanings.sent1: The new software update accidentally started disordering the computer system.
meanings.sent2: The construction noise was disordering the peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The prankster enjoyed disordering the neatly stacked books in the library.
meanings.sent4: The sudden power outage disordering the entire schedule of the event.
meanings.sent5: The chef's absence disordering the kitchen's usual workflow.

meanings.definition: Disrupt the normal course or unity of.
meanings.sent1: The loud argument was disordering the harmony of the family dinner.
meanings.sent2: The strike was disordering the production process at the factory.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected guest was disordering the carefully planned party.
meanings.sent4: The storm disordering the peaceful atmosphere of the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The broken microphone disordering the flow of the live performance.
